Literature.Title: Characterisation and evaluation of antiviral recombinant peptides based on the heptad repeat regions of NDV and IBV fusion glycoproteins.
Literature.Author: Wang XJ, Li CG, Chi XJ, Wang M

Literature.Title: A cholesterol tag at the N terminus of the relatively broad-spectrum fusion inhibitory peptide targets an earlier stage of fusion glycoprotein activation and increases the peptide's antiviral potency in vivo.
Literature.Author: Li CG, Tang W, Chi XJ, Dong ZM, Wang XX, Wang XJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Newcastle Disease Virus (NDV)(IC90 I=5µM),Infectious bronchitis virus (IBV/ACoV)(IC90 I=5µM),Newcastle Disease Virus (NDV)(IC50 F=0.0102µM)
